summary: Ebony quiver re-texture with a gold trim to match certain ebony armor sets.
descriptionHtml:
=================
Description:
=================

I decided to make Re-texture of the ebony quiver to match my gold trimmed ebony armor.
The gold trim is the only edit to the texture and I have left the remaining parts of the texture untouched. Size: 1k

=================
Installation
================

Use NMM installer or copy the folder manually to the data files.

=================
Un-Installation:
================

Remove File:
DataTexturesweaponsebonyebonyarrow.dds

=================
Mods used in the screens:
Kinamtic Extensive ENB
Ebony Valkyrie Armor
aMidianborn Ebony retexture

The Bow in the screens is a re-texture I am planning on releasing in the near future.
author: Sif
